result.title: Report on standards for competitiveness and employment, with risk profiles for eco-intensification
result.description: Eco-intensification is expected to impact on current and emergent trends in competition with other products (both aquatic and terrestrial substitutes) and the nature and amount of employment generated. Scenario analysis will be used to explore likely outcomes to optimise benefits and mitigate losses.
